text:
"Don't be a fool, casting at every blip you find out here. You want to get picked up by half the listening stations this side of the Sector?"
OR
"Keep it jolly, hunter. We'll be on our way."
OR
"Good hunting out here 'eh? Yeah, well I wouldn't tell if it was either. Burn bright."

"Greetings, honorable commander! We are a humble League merchant trading fleet headed for resupply. We would be honored to assist you in any way."
OR
"I must have left my transponder off; silly me. Here, I'll just be on my way..."

The anarchist $personRank glares at you briefly before shutting down the comm link.
OR
$personName glares defiantly. "You'll never take me alive!"
OR
"You fight like an algae-farmer! Less talk, more shoot."

"Attention, you belongs now to my black list of people than i need to kill. You, and all your possessions are now my personal property. Any resisting ship will be disabled, boarded, your officers massacred, and your crew sold as slaves.
We lie, your crew will be killed anyways.
"
OR
"Like you are not like me, die and let me go get your goods or you'll be taking a very long walk out the airlock once I've claimed your ship."
OR
The anarchist $personRank and their crews makes a rude gesture and laughs before cutting the transmission.
OR
"When you will go on Hell, tell 'em it was $personName that sent you and than we will come someday for them"
OR
The open comms-line crackles; after a moment $personName speaks.
"Wait, someone actually answered this thing? People like you know use this thing? Ah ah, die."
OR
"You come here for my pleasure, thank you." growls $personName.

"Unless I am reading my scopes wrong, you have no reason to be talkin' right now. Get it?"
OR
"Go away, I'm trying to kill you."
OR
"What, you scrubbing cryotanks? Get lost."
